greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number such that a(n) and nextprime(a(n)) differ by at least a power of 10, 10^m, where m >= n.
example: The primes following those shown are 3, 127, 370373, 1693182318747503. - _Michel Marcus_, Jan 29 2016
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(p = 2); while (nextprime(p+1) - p < 10^n, p = nextprime(p+1)); p;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 29 2016
results.author: _Jeff Burch_, Apr 02 2000
ext: Definition clarified by _Chai Wah Wu_, Jun 26 2019
